document_data.mainbody:
Briarsting was a thorn who was tasked with guarding the tomb of a long-dead druid in Waterdeeps City of the Dead. 
The thorn was friends with and often rode a semi-sentient topiary dragon with whom he guarded the druids tomb.
Around 1467â€“1479 DR, Briarsting helped Sophraea Carver undo the curse that Dorgar Adarbrent placed on tombs in the graveyard.
